name: Family Feud US Head to Head
name_original: Family Feud US Head to Head
description:
Use the Family Feud Buzzer app to play along with the Family Feud board game by Imagination.

There are two modes within the app: player mode and host mode.

HOST MODE:
The host mode can be used during all rounds.
Only one player can be the host at any one time.
The host reads the questions and reveals the answers and point values. To use the app in host mode, select from three sound options to confirm if an answer is the top answer, correct answer or wrong answer.

PLAYER MODE:
The player mode can be used during the Face Off rounds.
One player from each team buzzes in on the one device. The background screen of the first player to ‘buzz in’ will turn red.
